node.name: MDE Utils
node.shortdescription:
The main goal of this set of Eclipse plugins is to provide MDE utils developed by a MDE user for MDE users.
These plugins are developed upon EMF (Eclipse Modeling Framework).

All of the provided features are as UI Actions (right-clic on Files or Folders).
Main features for EMF and Ecore: EEnum fixer, Change NsURI, Mass remover, etc.
Several features are dedicated to related tools like EMFTriple (http://marketplace.eclipse.org/content/emf-triple), Kermeta (http://www.kermeta.org) and Kompose (http://www.kermeta.org).
node.body:
The main goal of this set of Eclipse plugins is to provide MDE utils developed by a MDE user for MDE users.
These plugins are developed upon EMF (Eclipse Modeling Framework).

All of the provided features are as UI Actions (right-clic on Files or Folders).
Main features for EMF and Ecore: EEnum fixer, Change NsURI, Mass remover, etc.
Several features are dedicated to related tools like EMFTriple (http://marketplace.eclipse.org/content/emf-triple), Kermeta (http://www.kermeta.org) and Kompose (http://www.kermeta.org).
